nodes.text: Yawrocca was a female Wookiee who lived in Cloud City on the planet Bespin during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire. She frequented the Four-and-a-half, an illegal cantina located in the Port Town district of the city. During the war, Yawrocca was considered the reigning Dejarik champion of the cantina.

Yawrocca first appeared in The Jewel of Yavin, an adventure module released in 2014 for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game. She is listed as a character players might interact with if they choose to play Dejarik, although no specific interaction is described.
